boardgame.name: Die Burgen von Burgund: Das Würfelspiel
The Castles of Burgundy: Le jeu de dés
The Castles of Burgundy: The Dice Game
boardgame.description: As influential sovereigns, expand your estates through trade and commerce. Combine the dice to your advantage and find the strategy that will lead you to victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The famous strategy game now in pure dice game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;dice version_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; of The Castles of Burgundy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game comes with 5 dice: A timer die, 2 number dice, and 2 color dice._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Like the board game, the idea is to fill as many things on your board, and get the most points, mostly by completing color regions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One player rolls the dice, and then everyone picks 2 dice to use: A color die, representing a type of hex on the board, and a number._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A hex can only be filled on the board if it's adjacent to an already-filled hex, or your starting castle, and each type of hex has its own rules for which number can be used to fill it, and its own reward._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;When completing a region of hexes, you get points, as well as a reward that you can then cross off to activate, such as workers and monks that let you treat a number or color die as having any value, and silver that lets you use a second combination of dice on a turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The timer die sets the pace of the game, and also triggers a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;shipping_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; action, where players can cross off collected crates for points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are 4 different board layouts included. Solo mode is included._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s DATENIGHT Episode 12 - An Array of Castles of Burgundy
